PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-13092017-10-27TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActTransportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada Act
PrecisAppointment of CHARLES STANLEY SULLIVAN of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of one year; and his designation as Vice-Chairperson of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada for a term of one year or until such time as a new Chairperson is appointed, whichever occurs first.
